languages.text: {n}Джай умело заговаривает зубы, но вы замечаете, как в попытке смухлевать она подсовывает на доску несколько новых "фигур". Чарующе улыбаясь и отвлекая ее светской беседой, вы незаметно меняете фигуры местами, поймав {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладную торговку{/g} в ее же ловушку.{/n}

{n}Jae tries to distract you with conversation, but you notice her sneak several new "pieces" onto the board. You give her a charming smile and continue to make small talk as you switch some of them around, catching the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g} in her own trap.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Джай умело заговаривает зубы, но вы замечаете, как в попытке смухлевать она подсовывает на доску несколько новых "фигур". Чарующе улыбаясь и отвлекая ее светской беседой, вы незаметно меняете фигуры местами, поймав {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}хладную торговку{/g} в ее же ловушку.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae is a skilled smooth talker, but you still notice her surreptitiously placing a number of new "pieces" onto the board. With a charming smile, you distract her with conversation while switching some of the pieces around, catching the Cold Trader in her own trap.{/n}

{n}Jae tries to distract you with conversation, but you notice her sneak several new "pieces" onto the board. You give her a charming smile and continue to make small talk as you switch some of them around, catching the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g} in her own trap.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae tente de détourner votre attention en faisant la conversation, mais vous la voyez placer discrètement plusieurs nouvelles « pièces » sur le plateau. Vous lui décochez un sourire charmeur et continuez à bavarder tout en déplaçant certaines des pièces pour prendre l'adepte du {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Commerce Froid{/g} à son propre piège.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae tries to distract you with conversation, but you notice her sneak several new "pieces" onto the board. You give her a charming smile and continue to make small talk as you switch some of them around, catching the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g} in her own trap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae tente de détourner votre attention en faisant la conversation, mais vous la voyez placer discrètement plusieurs nouvelles « pièces » sur le plateau. Vous lui décochez un sourire charmeur et continuez à bavarder tout en déplaçant certaines des pièces pour prendre l'adepte du Commerce Froid à son propre piège.{/n}

{n}Jae tente de détourner votre attention en faisant la conversation, mais vous la voyez placer discrètement plusieurs nouvelles « pièces » sur le plateau. Vous lui décochez un sourire charmeur et continuez à bavarder tout en déplaçant certaines des pièces pour prendre l'adepte du Commerce Froid à son propre piège.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae intenta distraerte conversando, pero puedes ver que cuela "piezas" adicionales en el tablero. Le dedicas una sonrisa encantadora y sigues charlando con ella mientras cambias la posición de algunas de ellas, volviendo su propia trampa contra la {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Comerciante Fría{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae tries to distract you with conversation, but you notice her sneak several new "pieces" onto the board. You give her a charming smile and continue to make small talk as you switch some of them around, catching the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g} in her own trap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae intenta distraerte conversando, pero puedes ver que cuela "piezas" adicionales en el tablero. Le dedicas una sonrisa encantadora y sigues charlando con ella mientras cambias la posición de algunas de ellas, volviendo su propia trampa contra ella.{/n}

languages.text: {n}婕伊打算通过谈话来分散你的注意力，但你却注意到，她偷偷地把几枚新的“棋子”放在了棋盘上。你对她露出了迷人的微笑，继续与她闲聊，同时把{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}冷市商人{/g}的棋子偷偷换成了你自己的棋子，以其人之道还治其人之身。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae tries to distract you with conversation, but you notice her sneak several new "pieces" onto the board. You give her a charming smile and continue to make small talk as you switch some of them around, catching the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g} in her own trap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}婕伊打算通过谈话来分散你的注意力，但你却注意到，她偷偷地把几枚新的“棋子”放在了棋盘上。你对她露出了迷人的微笑，继续与她闲聊，同时把她的棋子偷偷换成了你自己的棋子，以其人之道还治其人之身。{/n}
{n}婕伊打算通过谈话来分散你的注意力，但你却注意到，她偷偷地把几枚新的“棋子”放在了棋盘上。你对她露出了迷人的微笑，继续与她闲聊，同时把她的棋子偷偷换成了你自己的棋子，以其人之道还治其人之身。{/n}

languages.text: {n}ジェイは会話で気を紛らわそうとするが、彼女が新しい駒をいくつかボードに忍ばせているのに気づいた。あなたは魅力的な微笑みを浮かべ、世間話を続けながら、いくつかの駒を入れ替え、{g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}コールド・トレーダー{/g}を罠にかけようとした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae tries to distract you with conversation, but you notice her sneak several new "pieces" onto the board. You give her a charming smile and continue to make small talk as you switch some of them around, catching the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g} in her own trap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ジェイは会話で気を紛らわそうとするが、彼女が新しい駒をいくつかボードに忍ばせているのに気づいた。あなたは魅力的な微笑みを浮かべ、世間話を続けながら、いくつかの駒を入れ替え、コールド・トレーダーを罠にかけようとした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae versucht, dich durch Plaudereien abzulenken, doch du bemerkst, wie sie heimlich mehrere neue "Figuren" auf das Brett schummelt. Du lächelst sie charmant an und plauderst weiter, während du einige der Figuren untereinander austauschst und die {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Kalthändlerin{/g} so in ihre eigene Falle tappen lässt.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae tries to distract you with conversation, but you notice her sneak several new "pieces" onto the board. You give her a charming smile and continue to make small talk as you switch some of them around, catching the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g} in her own trap.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Jae versucht, dich durch Plaudereien abzulenken, doch du bemerkst, wie sie heimlich mehrere neue "Figuren" auf das Brett schummelt. Du lächelst sie charmant an und plauderst weiter, während du einige der Figuren untereinander austauschst und die Kalthändlerin so in ihre eigene Falle tappen lässt.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Jae, sohbetiyle dikkatini dağıtmaya çalışıyor ama tahtaya gizlice yeni "taşlar" yerleştirdiğini fark ediyorsun. Tatlı tatlı gülümsüyorsun ve hoşbeş ederken bazılarının yerini değiştiriyor, {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Soğuk Tacir{/g}'i kendi kurduğu tuzağa düşürüyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Jae tries to distract you with conversation, but you notice her sneak several new "pieces" onto the board. You give her a charming smile and continue to make small talk as you switch some of them around, catching the {g|Encyclopedia:ColdTrade}Cold Trader{/g} in her own trap.{/n}
